rows.label: qst700301_msg0001
rows.name:
Good travelers, can I ask you
something?

rows.label: qst700301_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm not sure if you've noticed, but
the lantern at the side of the gate
has gone out.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0003
rows.name: Doesn't that bother you?

rows.label: qst700301_msg0004
rows.name: Does the unlit lantern bother you?

rows.label: qst700301_msg0005
rows.name: It does

rows.label: qst700301_msg0006
rows.name: Not really

rows.label: qst700301_msg0007
rows.name:
Right? Like, what's the point of it
even being there?

rows.label: qst700301_msg0008
rows.name:
I've been hoping to get it repaired,
actually.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0009
rows.name: What do you mean, "not really"?!

rows.label: qst700301_msg0010
rows.name:
You're just like my brother, then.
He said it was just fine as it is...

rows.label: qst700301_msg0011
rows.name: Still, hear me out.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0012
rows.name:
See, I'm supposed to monitor the area,
so I can't afford to leave my station,
not even for a second.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0013
rows.name:
As for the guy next to me, well...he's
my brother, but for reasons I'd prefer
not to go into, I'd rather not ask him.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0014
rows.name:
You can talk to him if you want.
You'll soon understand.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0015
rows.name:
In any case, I've gotta do my duty
and keep watch over this place.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0016
rows.name:
I'm stuck at my post, lantern's out
of reach...

rows.label: qst700301_msg0017
rows.name:
You've probably guessed where this
is going.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0018
rows.name:
Think you could light up my life
a little?

rows.label: qst700301_msg0101
rows.name:
It'd be great if you could fix the
lantern out in front of the gate.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0102
rows.name:
I doubt you luminaries'll have any
trouble with that.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0103
rows.name: Come on, help a guard out.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0201
rows.name: I saw the whole thing!

rows.label: qst700301_msg0202
rows.name:
Awesome work. You've really
brightened up my day!

rows.label: qst700301_msg0203
rows.name: That takes care of that matter, then.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0204
rows.name: Which brings me to the next one.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0205
rows.name:
See, there's actually a bunch of
lanterns that have broken down
around the capital.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0206
rows.name:
I happened to notice them while I was
on patrol, and it really bugged me.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0207
rows.name:
As usual, my brother turned a blind
eye to the problem.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0208
rows.name:
So, being the model citizen that I am,
I thought I'd take the initiative and fix
'em all myself.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0209
rows.name:
Except I haven't been able to yet,
not since I've been lumbered with
guard duty.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0210
rows.name:
I reckon there were about four in total.
One in Formide Shopping Ward, one
in Fabri Industry Ward...

rows.label: qst700301_msg0211
rows.name:
One in Aurium Residential Ward...
Oh, and the last one was in Orem
Storage Ward.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0212
rows.name:
If you could nip round and fix those
four, it'd be a huge help. For me, and
for the people.
